actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide loans for the prevention or retarding of streambank erosion which threatens public and private facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to make loans to any public or private agency or individual for stabilizing streambanks when erosion threatens, or can be expected to threaten, any facility or structure, or produce or seriously aggravate flooding downstream.

titles.title: A bill to provide loans for the prevention or retarding of streambank erosion which threatens public and private facilities.
